events.message: We have received the application from the candidate for the software engineer position, including their resume and cover letter. The documents show strong experience in backend development and cloud infrastructure.
After reviewing the candidate's documents, the application has been categorized under the engineering cluster focusing on software development and devops roles given their experience and skills.
The recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to this case to ensure a proper follow-up and coordination of interviews with the candidate.

We conducted an initial screening call with the candidate to assess their technical background and cultural fit. The candidate showed strong enthusiasm and relevant experience in software engineering.
The candidate promptly responded to our follow-up asking for availability to schedule a technical interview, expressing eagerness to advance in the recruitment process.
The technical interview has been scheduled for the candidate on 2024-05-07, with senior engineers to evaluate coding skills, system design, and problem-solving abilities.
